subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sherman, an early master of the T-formation, led the Giants to N.F.L. title games in his first three seasons as coach. He played quarterback for Brooklyn College and the Philadelphia Eagles.
snippet: Mr. Sherman, an early master of the T-formation, led the Giants to N.F.L. title games in his first three seasons as coach. He played quarterback for Brooklyn College and the Philadelphia Eagles.
